channel.title: Portforwarding problems, rich dont close this
channel.description:
Alright, are your ports just not openeing on your router?!! when you portforward?! we'll ive got the answer for you.
~ONLY WORKS IF YOU HAVE A MODEM~ ~WORKS 100%~ ~WHY? WELL, THE ROUTER ENTHERNET CABLE CANNOT PROCESS THE PORTS BECAUSE IT DOES NOT HAVE A SECURITY SYSTEM TO CHECK IF IT IS SAFE OR NOT TO OPEN THE PORT. (ONLY SOME ROUTERS AKA MINE) SO THE MODEM ALLOWS BECAUSE IT HAS A FIREWALL!!! CHECK UR INTERNET FIREWALL, BUT YOUR ROUTER DOESNT HAVE ONE DOES IT? NOW TO ACESS YOUR MODEM PAGE TYPE IN YOUR EXTERNAL IP ADRESS FOUND AT WWW.CANYOUSEEME.ORG (SOME TIMES DOES NOT WORK, TRY IT THE NEXT DAY, YOUR DNS SERVER'S ARE DOWN) After you acess the page, put up aplications and gaming, click modify aplications and add a game that u dont have on your computer (server not client!!!) Then, modify that game delete al the ports on it, and then put port 43594 on it, turn the Game on, and go to www.canyouseeme.org (dont use utorrent) Then start ur server, and on the website put down 43594 if it says succesful That means u have AN OPEN PORT (your server must be on tho) Pictures- (my dns server's are down for my ip adress atm, i'll post pictures tommorow for my modem) [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/avred3.jpg[/img]

item.title: Portforwarding problems, rich dont close this
item.dc:creator: @Cody_The_Coder Cody The Coder
item.description:
@Cody_The_Coder wrote:

Alright, are your ports just not openeing on your router?!! when you portforward?! we’ll ive got the answer for you.

~ONLY WORKS IF YOU HAVE A MODEM~
~WORKS 100%~
~WHY? WELL, THE ROUTER ENTHERNET CABLE CANNOT PROCESS THE PORTS BECAUSE IT DOES NOT HAVE A SECURITY SYSTEM TO CHECK IF IT IS SAFE OR NOT TO OPEN THE PORT. (ONLY SOME ROUTERS AKA MINE) SO THE MODEM ALLOWS BECAUSE IT HAS A FIREWALL!!! CHECK UR INTERNET FIREWALL, BUT YOUR ROUTER DOESNT HAVE ONE DOES IT? NOW TO ACESS YOUR MODEM PAGE
TYPE IN YOUR EXTERNAL IP ADRESS FOUND AT
WWW.CANYOUSEEME.ORG
(SOME TIMES DOES NOT WORK, TRY IT THE NEXT DAY, YOUR DNS SERVER’S ARE DOWN)
After you acess the page, put up aplications and gaming, click modify aplications and add a game that u dont have on your computer (server not client!!!) Then, modify that game delete al the ports on it, and then put port 43594 on it, turn the Game on, and go to www.canyouseeme.org (dont use utorrent) Then start ur server, and on the website put down 43594 if it says succesful
That means u have AN OPEN PORT (your server must be on tho)
Pictures- (my dns server’s are down for my ip adress atm, i’ll post pictures tommorow for my modem)

avred3.jpg1094×542
